about_the_game:
The year is 2130. Your idyllic world of profit and loss lays in ruins. Mankind’s endless capitalism and destruction of decades gone by has given birth to a dark and desolate new world.

Now you must construct all-new technologically advanced production lines and mine resources from fallen cities as you look to rebuild your industrial empire in a bleak dystopian future.

Features

Full Content Upgrade

A whole new look for a new future! New Buildings, new vehicles, new products and new challenges await.

From Ruins to Riches

With all natural resources depleted, scavenge through the ruins of the past and mine the valuable stores within.

New Buildings & Transport

Place all new futuristic buildings as you construct your new business from the ground up. Build totally new buildings like the offshore algae farms or thorium mines, and transport them with new cargo dropships.

Futuristic Recipes

A new future, means new consumer demands. Produce Nuclear Power Cells, Subatomic Lasers and many more as you corner a new and exciting market.

New Songs

New futuristically inspired and specially composed tracks (with lots of synth) for 2130.

New Camera Effects

A new camera tilt feature and added Depth of Field camera effects mean give extra options for those pretty screenshots you love to share!
detailed_description:
2130 Plus Edition



The 2130 Plus Edition contains:

  • The Full 2130 Expansion - Welcome to the future - construct all-new technologically advanced production lines and mine resources from fallen cities as you look to rebuild your industrial empire in a bleak dystopian future.
  • 2130 OST - Featuring 9 tracks including 1 exclusive to the soundtrack
  • 2130 Artbook - See the artistic inspiration for the expansion
  • 2130 Recipe Book - All product recipes from the expansion in a handy PDF

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS 64 bit
  • Processor: Requires a 1024x768 screen resolution.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GT 600 or Radeon 5000 and above. Shader Model 51. Integrated GPUs not recommended
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 1024 x 768 screen resolution. Need to run the game in Windowed Mode.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.20GHz or AMD FX-6300, 3.5Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 900 or AMD HD7700 / RX360
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Resolution: 1920 x 1080. Need to run the game in Windowed Mode
